description:
Estiman is an original, engaging arcade game based on one of the processes our minds work with every
day – estimation. With combos you can keep going forever (if you have the skills!). The sweet, minimal visuals will appeal to your aesthetic sense, and an adaptive difficulty level turns this simple concept into a compelling and satisfying game.

ESTIMAN features:
• A unique, endless game with original estimation-based gameplay
• Relaxing gameplay that keeps you in a trance by engaging your special estimation skills
• Cool combos that enable a skilled player to keep going forever
• A minimal audio-visual experience that evolves as you play and explore your aesthetic sense
• A vast selection of game-altering modes and settings
• Controls utilise the steering possibilities provided by Nintendo Switch™
name: Estiman
